<script setup>

</script>

<template>
  <input v-model="newTaskDescription" placeholder="Enter a description"/>
  <button @click="addTask(description)">Add Task (enter description)</button>

</template>

<script>
import api from "@/services/api";
import {ref} from "vue";

const newTaskDescription = ref("");
const task=ref([])

export default {

  methods: {
    async addTask() {
      // if (!newTaskDescription.value.trim()) {
      //   alert("La description ne peut pas être vide !");
      //   return;
      // }

      try {
        const response = await api.addTask({ description: newTaskDescription.value });

        task.value.push(response);
        newTaskDescription.value="";
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Erreur lors de la récupération du titre :', error);
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>


<style scoped>

</style>
